title: Understanding $$45-45-90$$ Triangles
text: In a $$45-45-90$$ triangle, the two legs are equal in length, and the hypotenuse is always the leg length times the square root of $$2$$.

title: Formula for Hypotenuse
text: The formula for the hypotenuse in a $$45-45-90$$ triangle is: hypotenuse $$=$$ leg * $$\sqrt{2}$$.

title: Calculate the Hypotenuse
text: Given that the leg length is $$8$$ cm, use the formula to find the hypotenuse.
